title: Atenolol
summary: Atenolol is a beta blocker medication primarily used to treat high blood pressure and heart-associated chest pain.[1] Atenolol, however, does not seem to improve mortality in those with high blood pressure.[2][3] Other uses include the prevention of migraines and treatment of certain irregular heart beats.[1][4] It is taken by mouth or by injection into a vein.[1][4] It can also be used with other blood pressure medications.[4]
